• In Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, or related fieldStrong backend data model and schema design experiencesStrong expertise in LLMs and ML techniquesHigh proficiency in Python programming languageExperience in developing complex agentic systems using LLMsExperience in REST-based API developmentExperience in frontend development for system demonstrationProficiency in Deep Learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers, etc) University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Develop agentic system infrastructure and components and dataDesign and implement robust APIs and API framework-related featuresCreate visualization interfaces for system demonstrationFinetune AI models for agentic use casesDevelop metrics and tools to evaluate model performanceCollaborate with researchers, product managers, engineers, and designers.

• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field.
• Proven experience in fine-tuning large language models (LLMs), using GPT APIs, and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).
• Extensive hands-on experience with Generative AI (GenAI) use cases and the development of generative AI applications.
• Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries (e.
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to work with large datasets and derive actionable insights.
• Excellent communication and teamwork skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
• Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models and AI-driven solutions tailored to the needs of aging services and post-acute care.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into AI/ML solutions.

• Strong academic background with a good GPA (please include your GPA in your application).
• Graduating in 2025 with a Master’s program in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, or a related field.
• Collaborate with senior engineers to design, develop, and maintain AI applications.
• Work on projects related to AI/ML, Generative AI, RAG, and AI Agents.
• Utilize Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for AI development and deployment.
• Contribute to Open Source AI projects and tools.
• Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code in Python.
• Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging processes.

• Competitive salary with equity compensation401(k) retirement savings planComprehensive health, dental, vision, and life insuranceShort-term and long-term disability coverageCommuter benefits to support daily travelMonthly wellness stipend for fitness, mental health, or personal well-beingFlexible, autonomous work environment focused on outcomesReimbursement for home office or in-office equipment setupGenerous flexible time off policy, plus paid holidaysQuarterly team gatherings to foster collaboration and connectionIn-office perks, including snacks and refreshments Relevant Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s in Machine Learning, AI, Computer Science, or related field.
• Production-Level AI Experience: You’ve built and shipped complex AI/ML systems with real users.
• Model Optimization Expertise: Skilled in tuning and advancing foundation models.
• Analytical Mindset: Able to design meaningful metrics and frameworks for AI evaluation.
• Creative Problem Solver: Comfortable combining tools and models to build robust, real-world applications.
• Strong Product-Market Fit: Already trusted by 300+ law firms and experiencing rapid growth.
• Backed by Leading Investors: Supported by premier venture capital firms with over $60M raised to date.
• Top-Tier Talent: Built by a world-class team of engineers, designers, and operators from high-performing startups and major tech companies.
